ovdesc.p: This file is used for manual executions when confirmation of MT509 is received from broker through carrier other than SWIFT.

desc.p: This field holds the status of the broker when confirmation is received through carrier other than SWIFT. This forms associated multivalue set along with BROKER. NO.
This fields holds the following values: ACCEPTED, REJECTED
Up to 10 Alpha numeric characters in length
This field holds the broker number from whom the confirmation has been received. This forms associated multivalue set along with BR.MSG.STATUS field
ID will be same as SEC.OPEN.ORDER id. It will be validated against SP.ORDER.STP.ACTIVITY
Up to 17 Alpha numeric characters in length
